00032 namespace ebl {

00035   // supervised_trainer
00036 
00037   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00038   supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00039   supervised_trainer(fc_ebm2<state_idx, int, state_idx> &m, parameter &p,
00040                      ostream &cout_)
00041     : display_nh(0), display_nw(0), display_h0(0), 
00042       display_w0(0), display_zoom(1.0), iteration(-1), iteration_ptr(NULL),
00043       machine(m), param(p), energy(), label(), age(0), cout(cout_) {
00044     input = NULL; // allocated when input is passed, based in its order/dims
00045     energy.dx.set(1.0);
00046     energy.ddx.set(0.0);
00047   }
00048 
00049   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00050   supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::~supervised_trainer() {
00051     if (input) delete input;
00052   }
00053 
00054   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00055   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::set_display(unsigned int nh,
00056                                                       unsigned int nw,
00057                                                       unsigned int h0, 
00058                                                       unsigned int w0,
00059                                                       double zoom, int wid,
00060                                                       const char *title) {
00061 #ifdef __GUI__
00062     display_nh = nh;
00063     display_nw = nw;
00064     display_h0 = h0;
00065     display_w0 = w0;
00066     display_zoom = zoom;
00067     display_wid = (wid >= 0) ? wid : 
00068       gui.new_window((title ? title : "Supervised Trainer"));
00069     fpropdisplay_wid = gui.new_window("Supervised Trainer: fprop", 500, 500);
00070 #endif
00071   }
00072   
00073   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00074   int supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::run(state_idx &input, 
00075                                              infer_param &infp) {
00076     int answer = -1;
00077     machine.infer2(input, answer, energy, infp); // infer answer from energies
00078     return answer;
00079   }
00080   
00081   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00082   bool supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00083   test_sample(state_idx &input, int label, int &answer, infer_param &infp) {
00084     answer = run(input, infp);
00085     return (label == answer); // return true if correct answer
00086   }
00087 
00088   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00089   Idx<double> supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00090   learn_sample(state_idx &input, int label, gd_param &args) {
00091     machine.fprop(input, label, energy);
00092     param.clear_dx();
00093     machine.bprop(input, label, energy);
00094     param.update(args);
00095     return energy.x.get();
00096   }
00097 
00098   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00099   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00100   test(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, classifier_meter &log,
00101        infer_param &infp, bool display) {
00102     ds.seek_begin();
00103     log.clear();
00104     resize_input(ds);
00105     bool correct;
00106     int answer;
00107     if (!iteration_ptr) 
00108       iteration_ptr = (void *) &ds;
00109     if (iteration_ptr == (void *) &ds)
00110       ++iteration;
00111 #ifdef __GUI__
00112     unsigned int h = display_h0 + 35, w = display_w0, nh = 0, w01 = display_w0;
00113     unsigned int h2 = h, w2 = display_w0, w02 = display_w0, i2 = 0;
00114     int nfdisp = 2;
00115     unsigned int wfdisp = 0, hfdisp = 0;
00116     if (display) {
00117       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00118       Idx<double> m = input->x.select(0, 0);
00119 
00120       // fprop display
00121       gui.select_window(fpropdisplay_wid);
00122       gui.clear();
00123 
00124       // datasets displays
00125       gui.select_window(display_wid);
00126       gui.clear();
00127       w01 = display_w0 + display_nw * (m.dim(1) + 1) + 10;
00128       w02 = display_w0 + (display_nw * (m.dim(1) + 2) + 10) * 2;
00129       w = w01;
00130       w2 = w02;
00131       gui << cout_and_gui() << at(0, 0) << ds.name;
00132       gui << ": iter# " << iteration << " ";
00133       gui << gui_only();
00134       gui << at(display_h0 + 17, display_w0) << "Groundtruth";
00135       gui << at(display_h0 + 17, w01) << "Correct & incorrect answers";
00136       gui << at(display_h0 + 17, w02) << "Incorrect only";
00137       ds.display(display_nh, display_nw, h, display_w0, display_zoom,
00138                  display_wid);
00139     } else
00140       cout << ds.name << ": iter# " << iteration << " ";
00141 #endif
00142     for (int i = 0; i < ds.size(); ++i) {
00143       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00144       correct = test_sample(*input, label.get(), answer, infp);
00145       log.update(age, correct, energy);
00146       ds.next();
00147 #ifdef __GUI__
00148       if (display) {
00149         // display fprop
00150         if (i < nfdisp) {
00151           gui.select_window(fpropdisplay_wid);
00152           machine.display_fprop(*input, answer, energy, hfdisp, wfdisp, 3.0);
00153           hfdisp += 10;
00154         }
00155 
00156         gui.select_window(display_wid);
00157         Idx<double> m = input->x.select(0, 0);
00158         // display all display_nh*display_nw incorrect or correct answers
00159         if (nh < display_nh) {
00160           gui.draw_matrix_frame(m, (correct?0:128), 0, 0, h, w,
00161                                 0.0, 0.0, 
00162                                 display_zoom, display_zoom);
00163           if ((ds.lblstr) && (ds.lblstr->at(answer)))
00164             gui << at(h + 2, w + 2) << (ds.lblstr->at(answer))->c_str();
00165           w += m.dim(1) + 2;
00166           if (((i + 1) % display_nw == 0) && (i > 1)) {  
00167             w = w01;
00168             h += m.dim(0) + 2;
00169             nh++;
00170           }
00171         }
00172         // display first display_nh*display_nw incorrect answers
00173         if ((i2 < display_nh * display_nw) && (!correct)) {
00174           gui.draw_matrix_frame(m, (correct?0:128), 0, 0, h2, w2, 0.0, 0.0, 
00175                                 display_zoom, display_zoom);
00176           if ((ds.lblstr) && (ds.lblstr->at(answer)))
00177             gui << at(h2 + 2, w2 + 2) << (ds.lblstr->at(answer))->c_str();
00178           w2 += m.dim(1) + 2;
00179           if (((i2 + 1) % display_nw == 0) && (i2 > 1)) {  
00180             w2 = w02;
00181             h2 += m.dim(0) + 2;
00182           }
00183         }
00184         if (!correct)
00185           i2++;
00186       }
00187 #endif
00188     }
00189 #ifdef __GUI__
00190     gui << at(0, 200) << cout_and_gui();
00191 #endif
00192     log.display();
00193     cout << endl;
00194   }
00195   
00196   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00197   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00198   train(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, classifier_meter &log, 
00199         gd_param &args, int niter) {
00200     ds.seek_begin();
00201     log.clear();
00202     resize_input(ds);
00203     for (int i = 0; i < niter; ++i) { // niter iterations
00204       for (int j = 0; j < ds.size(); ++j) { // training on entire training set
00205         ds.fprop(*input, label);
00206         int lab = label.get();
00207         learn_sample(*input, lab, args);
00208         //      log.update(age, output, label.get(), energy);
00209         age++;
00210         ds.next();
00211       }
00212     }
00213   }
00214 
00215   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00216   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00217   compute_diaghessian(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, intg niter, 
00218                       double mu) {
00219     IdxDim d(ds.data.spec);
00220     if (!input) input = new state_idx(d);
00221     else input->resize(d);
00222     param.clear_ddeltax();
00223     for (int i = 0; i < niter; ++i) {
00224       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00225       int lab = label.get();
00226       machine.fprop(*input, lab, energy);
00227       param.clear_dx();
00228       machine.bprop(*input, lab, energy);
00229       param.clear_ddx();
00230       machine.bbprop(*input, lab, energy);
00231       param.update_ddeltax((1 / (double) niter), 1.0);
00232       ds.next();
00233     }
00234     param.compute_epsilons(mu);
00235     cout << "diaghessian inf: " << idx_min(param.epsilons);
00236     cout << " sup: " << idx_max(param.epsilons) << endl;
00237   }
00238 
00239   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00240   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00241   resize_input(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds) {
00242     IdxDim d(ds.data.spec);
00243     if (!input) input = new state_idx(d);
00244     else input->resize(d);
00245   }
